Package it.polimi.ingsw.PersonalBoard.Warehouse

Class WarehouseDepots

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PersonalBoard.Warehouse.WarehouseDepots
public class WarehouseDepots extends Object
This Class represents the warehouse depots associated to a player

  • Method Details

    • getResource

      public Resource[] getResource()
      Getter of the parameter resource
      Returns:
      a copy of the original array resource[], of type Resource[]

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(Resource r, int pos) throws PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException
      This method receives a resource and a position, and, after checking if the slot is free, the presence of the same resource in another shelf and the presence of different resources on the same shelf, adds the first into the array resource in the slot pointed by the second
      Parameters:
      r - : type of resource to be added
      pos - : position of the array
      Throws:
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException - if the position chosen is already occupied
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException - if the resource passed is present on a different shelf
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException - if there are different resources types already placed in the chosen shelf
      IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException - if you are out of bounds of the WarehouseDepots

    • moveResource

      public void moveResource​(int startPos, int finalPos) throws NotAdmittedMovementException, IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException
      This method receives two position, and, after checking if the move is possible on a copy, exchanges the resource present in the first with the second
      Parameters:
      startPos - : represents the first position
      finalPos - : represents the second position
      Throws:
      NotAdmittedMovementException - if the result is not respecting the warehouse rules
      IndexOutOfWarehouseDepotsException - if you are out of bounds of the WarehouseDepots

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource​(int pos) throws EmptySlotYetException
      This method removes the resource in the pointed position
      Parameters:
      pos - : position of the array
      Throws:
      EmptySlotYetException - : if the slot was empty

    • export

      public String export()
      This method exports the WarehouseDepots to a String
      Returns:
      a string with all the WarehouseDepots data, of type String
